ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idmatidpmat.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | idmatidpmat.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | idmatidpmat.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` ( N Mat R ) ) |
| 4 |  | idmatidpmat.i | |- I = ( 1r ` ( N Mat P ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N Mat R ) = ( N Mat R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( N Mat R ) ) = ( Base ` ( N Mat R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N Mat P ) = ( N Mat P ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( N Mat P ) ) = ( Base ` ( N Mat P ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 5, 6, 2, 7, 8 | #P_mat2pmat1 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( T ` ( 1r ` ( N Mat R ) ) ) = ( 1r ` ( N Mat P ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( T ` .1. ) = ( T ` ( 1r ` ( N Mat R ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10, 4 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( T ` .1. ) = I ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( T ` .1. ) = I ) |
